title: IBM Cloud Private Path solution guide
introduction: With IBM Cloud Private Path solution, providers can deliver services securely over the IBM Cloud private network backbone without exposing data over the public internet. Leverage the docs, API & SDK reference, architecture references, and more to support your infrastructure needs.

links.title: Ordering secondary subnets and global IP addresses
links.description: Secondary subnets provide additional, independent IP addresses for your compute resources and are available until canceled.

links.title: Working with global IP addresses
links.description: Manage global IP addresses associated with your subnets.

section_highlights.title: Getting started with subnets and IPs
section_highlights.description: Get started setting up subnets and IPs.

section_highlights.title: About subnets and IPs
section_highlights.description: Learn specific terminology for the types, and uses, of subnets. Knowing their intended use helps you understand how best to use them in your cloud infrastructure.

tiles.title: Remove obsolete links
tiles.description: Removed obsolete links from the getting started and ordering topics.
